parameters:
Mage Relm: We were transported by a magic circle, and what's
more, the magic circle was intentionally destroyed.
Mage Relm: As expected of the court magician...
Clea: It's clear that Elatoma wasn't acting alone.
Clea: In other words... the royal palace might be involved.
Thief Nora: So, so, do you know about the queen too!?

Clea: I don't know about that... but Sophia-san, do you
happen to know something?

Priestess Sophia: I had so much fun traveling together with
all of you until today. I never imagined that we would go on
such a grand adventure and defeat a dragon.

Priestess Sophia: You will probably be disappointed in me...
but I can't lie... at least not to everyone.

Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: My real name is Alicia, and I
used to be a torturer belonging to the Imperial Shadow
Division, Ishekel.

Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: That's my true identity.
There's no such person as Priestess Sophia.

Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: A torturer becoming a
priestess... hehehe, I wonder why I chose that.

Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: Even someone like me has a
dream, and that is to see the first prince ascend to the
throne.
Clea: I heard that she went missing...

Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: That person, Lex, who belongs
to the Adventurer's Guild, is the legitimate successor of
the Fotizona Empire.

Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: The Imperial Shadow Division
Ishekel has started moving... There's no more time left, I
alone can't handle it.

Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: So please, I beg of you! I
want you to cooperate in making Prince Lex, that person, the
king!

Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: You don't have to believe in
me, you can even despise me. I will do anything if it means
making that person the king!
Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: So... please... everyone...

Clea: I can't make the decision alone, but I can go and
consult with the guild leader.
Clea: Let's return to the guild right away.

Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: Clea-chan, aren't you going
to say anything...? I was hiding my true identity...
deceiving everyone.
Clea: To me, you are a kind older sister who likes alcohol.
Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: But I...

Thief Nora: I think that's fine! Sophia-san is a kind person
who shares bread with us!

Mage Relm: Let's save the complicated talk for later. For
me, Sophia-san is also a friend.

Former Imperial Shadow Alicia: I wanted to meet all of
you... much, much earlier...
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Will you touch the shrine of the demon Ishekel, the
conqueror?
Clea (Let's prepare first and then do it)

Priestess Sophia: Ishekel, the conqueror... a traitor who
sold information about the demons to the goddess.

Priestess Sophia: And it's also the name of the Imperial
Dark Division, I can't help but feel some kind of
connection.

Thief Nora: My luck is really good! Let's defeat it together
with the unpleasant things!

Mage Relm: If it's the conqueror demon Sophia, even a
difficult path can be overcome.
Priestess Sophia: Hehe, thank you... I will fight.
Clea: It seems like the opponent is ready.

Priestess Sophia: The illusion has disappeared... but the
opponent I should defeat is not the illusion.

Priestess Sophia: Hehe, to think that someone bearing the
name of the symbol of the clergy, Imiserinos, would appear
from the illusion of the demon symbolizing the dark
division.

Clea: It's fateful, isn't it, Sophia-san? Let's go and
deliver the heart of Imiserinos to Elero-san.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
